snippet: The former national security adviser made the plea in connection with $423,000 in Nigerian and United States currency seized at his homes.
abstract: Former top Nigerian official Sambo Dasuki pleads not guilty to money laundering charges.
lead_paragraph: The former national security adviser made the plea in connection with $423,000 in Nigerian and United States currency seized at his homes.

headline.print_headline: Nigeria: Former Official Pleads Not Guilty in Corruption Case
headline.main: Nigeria: Former Official Pleads Not Guilty in Corruption Case
